creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: beige background with irregular circular grey form with light yellow spots; large, irregular, skewed pink form at center with light wafting line of impressed, untinted page over top and at L; circular and organic rust colored form at LL with overlapping red, purple, and green rounded forms; green and light grey marks to the R of the colorful overlapping area; curving brown form across lower portion extending to R center
signed: bottom margin, LRQ, in pencil: [Corsage (M) Rikio Takahashi 1970]
title: Corsage (M)
